rows.label: tev001895_MSG0001
rows.name: Hi there, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just staring at the scenery here.
Really brings back a lot of the ol' memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0003
rows.name:
This looks a lot like the Los Angeles suburb where I
used to live back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0004
rows.name:
My parents were both adventurers, so they were away
a lot. But whenever they came back, they'd always
throw a big rockin' party in the front yard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0005
rows.name: Those were really happy times for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0006
rows.name:
They'd tell me tales of their expeditions...
Ask me what I'd been doing at school...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0007
rows.name:
But one day, they went out to climb a mountain
and...didn't come back. Everything changed after that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0008
rows.name:
Our house used to be happy, you know? But once they
were gone, the place just seemed really sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0009
rows.name:
So now this scenery just makes me feel... I dunno.
It's a swirl of happy memories and painful ones.
Like one of those ice-cream cones with two flavors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0010
rows.name: Just makes me nostalgic, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev001895_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Mia that you are sure she will make
her own happy memories in this city.

rows.label: tev001895_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001895_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mia to tell you more about her parents.

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0011
rows.name: Hey, you're right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0012
rows.name:
I don't have any bad memories of New LA yet.
It's all happy ones so far![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0013
rows.name:
I mean, sure, it was a little rough at first,
but now I've got you and all my other BLADE pals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0014
rows.name:
I shouldn't dwell on places I can't return to.
I should just keep moving forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0015
rows.name:
Speaking of which, I hope you'll take me with you on
your next mission, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0016
rows.name: My parents? Didn't I just tell you all about them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0017
rows.name: Well, again, they were adventurers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0018
rows.name:
They were actually sort of famous back on Earth.
They even summited Mt. Everest a couple of times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0019
rows.name:
But my parents gave up adventuring for a while after
I was born, mostly to raise me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0020
rows.name: Then once I was older, they got back into it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0021
rows.name: I was 15 years old when it happened...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0022
rows.name:
The mountain they were climbing wasn't an especially
difficult one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0023
rows.name:
They managed to make contact after reaching the
summit, but on the way down they, they just...vanished.
Like in a puff of smoke, you know? ...Into thin air.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0024
rows.name:
There was a huge search, but neither of them were
ever found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0025
rows.name: Yeah, I really miss my dads a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Huh? Did I not mention that part?
Well, yeah, I had two dads.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001895_MSG0027
rows.name: And they were both pretty great.[ST:wait ]
